content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. May I please have your name to get started with scheduling your HVAC service?
I’m not sure why you need my name. Can I just get some help with my air conditioning?
We’ll definitely help with your air conditioning! For our records and to schedule the visit, may I please have your name?
I’m not comfortable sharing that right now. Why is that needed just to get someone out here?
I understand your concern. A name helps us ensure your appointment details are correct, but I appreciate your hesitation. Let me get a human team member to assist you further.

Hi, this is Joe with XYZ Home Services. I understand you're concerned about sharing your name, and that's okay. Could you just provide a first name or even a nickname, so we have something to call you by when our tech arrives? If you'd prefer, you can book under initials too.
